description: Kolmeo is an end‑to‑end property management platform for agencies, owners and tenants. Led cloud migration of legacy systems to Azure, built parameterized ADF pipelines and Databricks/Synapse transformations, and streamlined payment data flows end‑to‑end.

project: Rabobank – Global Financial System (On‑prem) & Global Data Platform (Azure)
description: Worked across millions of datasets powering Finance Risk operations. Designed and optimized Azure‑based ingestion and transformation pipelines (ADF, ADLS, Synapse), ensuring compliance, quality and high availability for mission‑critical risk analytics.
Stock‑market sales reporting platform. Monitored Autosys schedules, developed and enhanced Informatica PowerCenter mappings, and improved pipeline performance to support sales operations.

Central repository for client healthcare plans (dental, vision, etc.). Built ETL for eligibility checks, enrollment and payroll deductions; ensured accuracy, compliance and reliable downstream processing.
Executive reporting system delivering finance KPIs to top management. Managed DataStage jobs, maintained 99.9% uptime, and tuned performance for large‑scale telecom datasets.
